briefTitle: Aripiprazole for Schizophrenia Outpatients Completing BMS Clinical Trials
officialTitle: Aripiprazole (BMS-337039) for Outpatients With Schizophrenia Completing Aripiprazole Clinical Trials: A Non-Comparative Rollover Protocol
summary: The purpose of this study is to provide aripiprazole to schizophrenic outpatients and Community Treated Patients who are currently receiving aripiprazole therapy on another BMS sponsored clinical trial.

primaryOutcome.measure: Mean Clinical Global Impression Severity Score (CGI-S) From Baseline Through End of Study- - Safety Population.
